description: With a PhD in Horticulture, Dr. Vance is an authority on plant pathology and integrated pest management. She's known for her sustainable solutions.
Marcus has spent two decades cultivating rare tropical species. His expertise lies in replicating jungle environments indoors and advising on unique plant needs.
Sophia is a renowned succulent artist and grower. Her deep knowledge helps enthusiasts keep their desert-loving plants thriving in diverse climates.
David specializes in helping city dwellers maximize small spaces for greenery, focusing on edible plants, herbs, and creating lush indoor oases.
